product_name: Swiss-Tech Bodygard 7-in-1 Platinum Series Emergency Tool Keychain
long_description: The Swiss-Tech BodyGard(R) 7-in-1 Platinum Series Emergency Tool keychain combines a glass breaker, seat belt cutter, sonic alarm and LED flashlight in a device small enough to fit in your pocket. Automatic glass breaker is a spring-loaded, high-carbon steel pin designed to break automobile glass when pressed flush against the surface. Seat belt cutter blade is housed securely within the casing to prevent accidental cutting. With the push of a button, the sonic alarm signals trouble with a high-decibel output; signal for help with the bright, flashing red distress light. High-intensity LED flashlight operates on high and low to light up dark paths and alleys. Also includes a thermometer and digital tire gauge. Swiss-Tech BodyGard(R) 7-in-1 Platinum Series Emergency Tool keychain includes one user-replaceable A23 battery.
short_description: The Swiss-Tech BodyGard(R) 7-in-1 Platinum Series Emergency Tool keychain combines a glass breaker, seat belt cutter, sonic alarm and LED flashlight in a device small enough to fit in your pocket.
